title: All liquor stores to remain closed on Poson Poya
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Public Administration Ministry has ordered for all bars and liquor stores, slaughterhouses, meat stalls, casinos, nightclubs and liquor stores within supermarkets to remain closed on June 14th.
The Ministry has ordered for all above places to remain closed in view of the Poson Poya day on 14th.
